strapiEvent.name: A Crowne-Ing Affair
strapiEvent.organization: The Music Education Initiative and the Fayetteville Public Library
strapiEvent.description: A benefit celebration to honor local music and entertainment LIVING LEGEND, Brian Crowne of George's Majestic Lounge and VP of the Walmart AMP, with the “Friend of the Community Award” for his involvement, impact and commitment to live music, venues, music promotion, musical artists, bands, and music education. The Divas on Fire will headline the evening, with The Tina Cossey Band, opening. A live auction by The Auction Divas will highlight the night, with opportunities to bid on one of two incredible trips to Italy and other items.
